elements.guidelines:
Keep Guidelines where the creative process happens.

These are sample guidelines that you can place for the whole content item. It’s a place where you can include your content brief, voice and tone recommendations or the URL to a wireframe, so the author will have all the relevant instructions at hand before writing a single line.

Besides overview guidelines, you can include instructions for each particular content element, as you will see below.

Guidelines sample

All articles will be displayed in the same section of the web site. Stick to an informal tone of voice when writing articles.

Use the following keywords: grinders, dripper, coffee.

elements.name: Title
elements.guidelines: The title should fit within 60 characters.Our voice and tone recommendations: — avoid coffee jargon.

elements.name: Teaser image
elements.guidelines: Upload an image at a resolution of at least 600 × 1200 px.

elements.name: Post date
elements.guidelines: Provide a date that will appear on the live site as the date this article was posted live. This date will also influence the order of the articles.

elements.name: Summary
elements.guidelines: Provide a short summary of the text. It should be catchy and make the visitor want to read the whole article.The summary should fit within 160 characters.

elements.name: Body Copy
elements.guidelines: Keep the article structured with concise paragraphs complemented with headlines that will help the reader navigate through the article's content.Preferred glossary terms — coffee, brewing, grinder, drip, roast, filter.

elements.name: Related articles
elements.guidelines: Provide articles with related topics.

elements.name: Meta keywords
elements.guidelines: Enter tags separated with a comma. Example: coffee, "coffee roast”, grinder
Provide all personas for which this article is relevant.

elements.name: Meta description
elements.guidelines: Sum up the blog for SEO purposes. Limit for the meta description is 160 characters.

elements.name: URL pattern
elements.guidelines: Provide a SEO-friendly URL.

Keep Guidelines where the creative process happens.

These are sample guidelines that you can place for the whole content item. It’s a place where you can include your content brief, voice and tone recommendations or the URL to a wireframe, so the author will have all the relevant instructions at hand before writing a single line.

Besides overview guidelines, you can include instructions for each particular content element, as you will see below.

elements.name: Title
elements.guidelines: Provide a title that fits within 60 characters.

elements.name: Description
elements.guidelines: Include a main goal of our business. The limit is 80 characters.

elements.name: Image
elements.guidelines: Attach a teaser image; max. dimensions are 1280 × 600 px; allowed formats are *.jpg, *.png, *.gif.

Keep Guidelines where the creative process happens.

These are sample guidelines that you can place for the whole content item. It’s a place where you can include your content brief, voice and tone recommendations or the URL to a wireframe, so the author will have all the relevant instructions at hand before writing a single line.

Besides overview guidelines, you can include instructions for each particular content element, as you will see below.

elements.name: Product name
elements.guidelines: Include a product display name.

elements.name: Price
elements.guidelines: Include a product price.

elements.name: Image
elements.guidelines: Upload a product image; the recommended size is 300 × 300 px.

elements.name: Short description
elements.guidelines: Include a short description that fits within 160 characters.

elements.name: Long description
elements.guidelines: Include a full product description.
Add a product status if the product is included in a special offering.

elements.name: Farm
elements.guidelines: Include the name of the coffee farm.

elements.name: Country
elements.guidelines: Include  the coffee's country of origin.

elements.name: Variety
elements.guidelines: Include a coffee variety name.

elements.name: Altitude
elements.guidelines: Include the altitude at which the coffee is grown. Elevation affects the size, shape, and taste of coffee beans.

elements.name: URL pattern
elements.guidelines: Provide a SEO-friendly URL.

Keep Guidelines where the creative process happens.

These are sample guidelines that you can place for the whole content item. It’s a place where you can include your content brief, voice and tone recommendations, or the URL to a wireframe, so the author will have all the relevant instructions at hand before writing a single line.

Besides overview guidelines, you can include instructions for each particular content element, as you will see below.

Home page is modular

The home page is built of multiple content items based on smaller content types to embrace a modular approach. This lets you compose pages of independent modules.

For example, a Hero unit,  Articles, or Fact about us are smaller content chunks that you can create independently and then assign to a homepage to have it all together.

elements.name: Hero unit
elements.guidelines: Assign 1 Hero unit that has been prepared for a home page.

elements.name: Articles
elements.guidelines: Assign all articles which should be displayed on the home page.

elements.name: Our story
elements.guidelines: Assign 1 Fact about us which will be displayed on the home page.

elements.name: Cafes
elements.guidelines: Assign 4 Cafes which will be displayed on the home page.

elements.name: Contact
elements.guidelines: Add Contact us information to be displayed on the home page.

elements.name: URL pattern
elements.guidelines: Provide a SEO-friendly URL.
